name: Chest Opener
description:
Tired of having your PC running with low RAM usage? Well, fear no more! Chest Opener grants you an opportunitty to have an use for those annoying useless extra GBs while doing nothing! 

The goal of the game is to 'speedrun' the total of 11 achievements. The time needed for the chest to open will change for everyone and for every try. How long will it take you to complete them? Will you be faster than your friends?
